overview:
One of the most sought-after consultants, speakers and thought leaders on marketing innovation, Joseph Jaffe is founder and partner of Evol8tion, LLC, an innovation agency, focusing on fusing the worlds of Madison Avenue and Mountain View to create startups for brands (www.startupsforbrands.com)

Prior to that, Joseph founded and ran a strategic consultancy, crayon, which was acquired by Powered in January 2010.

Before that, Joseph was Director of Interactive Media at TBWA/Chiat/Day and OMD.

Jaffe is author of three books: Life after the 30-second spot, Join the Conversation and Flip the Funnel.
